# Marine Evolutionary Genomics: bioc 281


#### Dr. Reid Brennan
#### Summer 2022
#### GEOMAR

Welcome! This is a master's level course designed to give a background in evolutionary genomics, predominantly relating to population and quantitative genomics (though not exclusively). 

Class is held Mondays, 13:15-16:00 in room B106 West Shore.
